subject: Playoff Games
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers’ Derick Brassard, Mats Zuccarello and Benoit Pouliot have provided the bulk of the scoring in the playoff series against the Penguins.
snippet: The Rangers’ Derick Brassard, Mats Zuccarello and Benoit Pouliot have provided the bulk of the scoring in the playoff series against the Penguins.
